column4: REPEAT (cause didn't get clear answer): hey guys just a quick question about reinstalling ubuntu. I installed it creating 4 partitions: /boot; swap; / ; /home. I just want to reinstall Ubuntu. What do I do? I just format and reinstall it on "/" right? I want to keep /home
do I have to or not?
that's the only unclear thing there is
Just choose manual partitioning, and when it asks you to set the partitions up, choose "use existing" for /home, and choose the correct partition that contains /home from the previous installation.
